name: Mavek
appearance: Ashmask often hanging at his neck, lip scar from a kiln door, tar-blackened nails and an easy grin.
character: Publicly jocular, privately ruthless; counts favors as carefully as coin.
talents: tells a sack's true weight by heft
flaws: sentimental toward apprentices who remind him of his brother
dreams: legal night docks under Veil stewardship
a furnace-house raised above water, untouchable by raids
free his sister from debtor lanterns
secrets: maintains a culvert path into the Hall of Lanterns' ash pits
keeps sprigs of black reed-seed that sprout in embers
pays a tithe to the witch-mirror with other people's debts
